attributes.action: instigate a full investigation into online shopping scams and the rights of the online consumer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been many scams on the internet recently to con honest people out of their hard earned cash. These "companies" are able to con people for weeks before anybody notices and when they are flagged, nothing is truly done about it with any vigour or swiftness. The law needs to be changed in order to bring both justice to the consumer and cummupence to the perpetrators.
